member.summary: Represents an event handler that holds recorded audio data.

member.name: T:Shamisen.IO.DataAvailableEventArgs
member.summary:
Represents an event arguments that holds recorded audio data.
It is a struct which has ref and readonly modifier because the event occurs frequently and has a to deliver a raw buffer.
CAUTION! REF STRUCT! IT CANNOT BE STORED ON HEAPS!

member.name: T:Shamisen.IO.Devices.ConfigurationPropertyPriority
member.summary:
Defines the values for priority of settings.
The "best" in documents of each values means highest for and , lowest for .
For , the device should be rendering each channels as close as it's originally intended as a result of initialization.

member.name: F:Shamisen.IO.Devices.ConfigurationPropertyPriority.Optional
member.summary: If the value is set, the initializer should set the property exactly to the specified value, but can ignore the setting if it's impossible to obey.

member.name: F:Shamisen.IO.Devices.ConfigurationPropertyPriority.BestPossible
member.summary: The initializer should set the property to the best possible value, regardless of the set value.

member.name: F:Shamisen.IO.Devices.ConfigurationPropertyPriority.BestEffort
member.summary:
The initializer should set the property to a minimum value greater than the specified value.
The initializer can compromise the setting if it's impossible to meet at least the minimum necessary conditions.

member.name: F:Shamisen.IO.Devices.ConfigurationPropertyPriority.RequiredBestOrExact
member.summary:
The initializer must set the property to the best possible value, regardless of the set value.
The initializer must cancel the initialization if it's impossible to meet at least the minimum necessary conditions.

member.name: F:Shamisen.IO.Devices.ConfigurationPropertyPriority.RequiredExactOrBetter
member.summary:
The initializer must set the property to a minimum value greater than the specified value.
The initializer must cancel the initialization if it's impossible to meet at least the minimum necessary conditions.

member.name: F:Shamisen.IO.Devices.ConfigurationPropertyPriority.RequiredExact
member.summary:
The initializer must set the property exactly to the specified value.
The initializer must cancel the initialization if it's impossible to set the specified conditions exactly.

member.summary: The value which indicates the had no ability to check the support status.

member.summary: The is not supported by both device and binding.

member.name: F:Shamisen.IO.FormatSupportStatus.SupportedByBinding
member.summary: The is supported by the binding, but requires either down-sampling, re-quantization, or both, which may result in lower quality.

member.name: F:Shamisen.IO.FormatSupportStatus.SupportedByHardware
member.summary: The is supported by the hardware and does not require any down-sampling or re-quantization.

member.name: F:Shamisen.IO.IOExclusivity.Shared
member.summary:
The will be opened under some sharing system.
The other applications will be able to access the device.

member.name: F:Shamisen.IO.IOExclusivity.Exclusive
member.summary:
The will be created exclusively.
The other applications can't access the device anymore.
